property.name: queryDescription
property.value: Show All Members

property.name: query
property.value: select substr(id, 1, 48) as "Id", substr(netservers, 1, 30) as "NetServers", pid from sys.members

property.name: queryDescription
property.value: View Schemas

property.name: query
property.value: select schemaname from sys.sysschemas

property.name: queryDescription
property.value: View Memory Usage of All Tables/Indexes

property.name: query
property.value: SELECT * FROM sys.memoryAnalytics;

property.name: queryDescription
property.value: members running AsyncEventListeners/DBSynchronizers with status

property.name: query
property.value: select m.ID DSID, m.status, s.schemaname, t.tablename, t.datapolicy, t.GATEWAYENABLED, t.servergroups from SYS.SYSTABLES t, SYS.MEMBERS m, SYS.ASYNCEVENTLISTENERS a, sys.sysschemas s where groupsintersect(a.SERVER_GROUPS, m.SERVERGROUPS) and groupsintersect(t.ASYNCLISTENERS, a.ID) and groupsintersect(t.schemaid, s.schemaid) order by t.tablename, m.id

property.name: queryDescription
property.value: Tables in a given Schema

property.name: query
property.value: select tablename, servergroups, datapolicy, loader, writer from sys.systables where tableschemaname = ? and tabletype = 'T'

property.name: queryDescription
property.value: Tables in a given Schema with persistence turned on

property.name: query
property.value: select tablename, servergroups, datapolicy, loader, writer from sys.systables where tableschemaname = ? and tabletype = 'T' and datapolicy like '%PERSISTENT%'

property.name: queryDescription
property.value: Tables in a given Schema with PARTITION data policy

property.name: query
property.value: select tablename, servergroups, datapolicy, loader, writer from sys.systables where tableschemaname = ? and tabletype = 'T' and datapolicy like '%PARTITION%'

property.name: queryDescription
property.value: View Tables for a given Schema and Server Group

property.name: query
property.value: select tablename, servergroups, datapolicy, loader, writer from sys.systables where tableschemaname = ? and tabletype = 'T' and servergroups = ?

property.name: queryDescription
property.value: View PARTITION attributes for all PARTITION tables in a given schema

property.name: query
property.value: select tablename, datapolicy, partitionattrs from sys.systables where tableschemaname = ? and tabletype = 'T' and datapolicy like '%PARTITION%'

property.name: queryDescription
property.value: Tables in a given Schema with their eviction/expiration attributes

property.name: query
property.value: select tablename, expirationattrs, evictionattrs from sys.systables where tableschemaname = ? and tabletype = 'T'

property.name: queryDescription
property.value: Tables in a given Schema with their persistence attributes

property.name: query
property.value: select TABLENAME, datapolicy, DISKATTRS from sys.systables where tableschemaname = ? and tabletype = 'T' and diskattrs is not null

property.name: queryDescription
property.value: Async Event Listeners for a Table

property.name: query
property.value: select m.ID DSID, m.status, s.schemaname, t.tablename, t.datapolicy, t.GATEWAYENABLED, t.servergroups from SYS.SYSTABLES t, SYS.MEMBERS m, SYS.ASYNCEVENTLISTENERS a, sys.sysschemas s where t.tablename = ? and groupsintersect(a.SERVER_GROUPS, m.SERVERGROUPS) and groupsintersect(t.ASYNCLISTENERS, a.ID) and groupsintersect(t.schemaid, s.schemaid)

property.name: queryDescription
property.value: Memory Usage or Table

property.name: query
property.value: SELECT * FROM sys.memoryAnalytics where table_name = ?

property.name: queryDescription
property.value: Members hosting table data

property.name: query
property.value: select id from (select id, servergroups from sys.members where hostdata = 1) as a, sys.systables b where b.tableschemaname = ? and b.tablename = ? and (LENGTH(b.SERVERGROUPS) = 0 or GROUPSINTERSECT(a.SERVERGROUPS, b.SERVERGROUPS))

property.name: queryDescription
property.value: Indexes in a given Schema

property.name: query
property.value: select distinct indexname, "UNIQUE", tablename, indextype, COLUMNS_AND_ORDER, schemaname from sys.indexes where schemaname = ?

property.name: queryDescription
property.value: Indexes in a given Schema for a given Table

property.name: query
property.value: select distinct indexname, "UNIQUE", tablename, indextype, COLUMNS_AND_ORDER, schemaname from sys.indexes where schemaname = ? and tablename = ?

property.name: queryDescription
property.value: Views in a given Schema

property.name: query
property.value: select t.tableschemaname, t.tablename "Index Name", v.viewdefinition, t.datapolicy from SYS.SYSVIEWS v, SYS.SYSSCHEMAS s, sys.systables t where s.schemaid = v.compilationschemaid and t.tableid = v.tableid and s.schemaname = ? order by 1, 2

property.name: queryDescription
property.value: All HDFS Stores

property.name: query
property.value: select name, namenode, homedir from sys.SYSHDFSSTORES order by 1

property.name: queryDescription
property.value: View HDFS Tables by Schema

property.name: query
property.value: select tableschemaname, tablename, servergroups, datapolicy, loader, writer FROM SYS.SYSTABLES t, sys.sysschemas s WHERE s.schemaid = t.schemaid and t.TABLESCHEMANAME = ? and t.tabletype != 'V' and t.datapolicy like 'HDFS%' order by 1, 2

property.name: queryDescription
property.value: All Running Gateway Senders

property.name: query
property.value: select m.id, m.netservers, g.sender_id, g.server_groups from sys.members m, sys.gatewaysenders g where groupsintersect(m.servergroups, g.server_groups)
